imdb.title: Wagamama High Spec
imdb.plot: Even though he's just a student, the protagonist in Wagamama High Spec also happens to be the author of a manga published in a weekly magazine. Since it's mainly an ecchi and romcom type of story, he is actually hiding this fact f...

episodes.title: Glaring Summer Days
episodes.plot: It's still only June, but Ousui Academy is stricken by intense heat. To make matters worse, the air conditioner in the student council room is broken. Then Ashe comes up with an idea to combat the heat.

episodes.title: Cheerful Cooking
episodes.plot: Miyase Restaurant, Mihiro's family business, plans to add some new items to its menu for the summer so Mihiro decides to ask the other student council members to help come up with ideas.

episodes.title: Last-Minute Drawing
episodes.plot: As the deadline for her manuscript approaches, Kaoruko is struggling with the poses of some of the characters, so she asks Toa and Mihiro to model for her. Toa isn't interested at first, but when Kaoruko offers her favorite food as compensation.

episodes.title: Frantic Hunting
episodes.plot: Though Kaoruko has completed her mountain of work, the student council room is now buried under a mountain of trash. Kaoruko was enjoying the feeling of having her manuscript done, but then a small black form scurries in front of her.

episodes.title: Scary After-School
episodes.plot: Ashe is reading a book of school horror stories and loses track of the time. When she finally gets up to leave, the school is already dark and empty.

episodes.title: Puzzlingly Mysterious
episodes.plot: Kaoruko gets excited after noticing a strange paper that Toa's brother, Kouki, left on the desk in the student council room, believing it to be the key to writing the next chapter of their manga.

episodes.title: Mumbly Sleeping
episodes.plot: Kaoruko has bags under her eyes due to how she has been burning the midnight oil. Ashe and Mihiro, noticing this, are determined to put Kaoruko to sleep and let her have some rest.

episodes.title: Heart-Pounding Mechanics
episodes.plot: There is a robot in the student council room that can supposedly help with school life. Ashe, excited at seeing a robot for the first time, is keen to examine it but accidentally breaks off the robot's head. Mihiro then lets Ashe be the 'new robot' instead by wrapping her with cardboard and stashing the real robot away.

episodes.title: Kitty Kitty Melancholic
episodes.plot: Mihiro has found a cat outside the school and takes it to Toa, asking for help to find its owner as there is a collar around it.

episodes.title: This-and-That Slapstick
episodes.plot: Since the academy's website can now upload videos, advised by the teachers, Kaoruko wants the student council to upload a movie.

episodes.title: Round-and-Round Swimming
episodes.plot: The girls are at a spa resort having fun at the pool, and Ashe shows them how to dive. She executes it perfectly, but loses her bra in the process.

episodes.title: Exciting Surprise
episodes.plot: The student council starts preparing for Kouki's surprise birthday party. They want to thank him for all he has done, while Toa points out that they rely on her brother too much, and lately he spends more time outside than in the student council.
